En.GREEDENT_PA1_TEXT_1: When Greedent eats a berry, recover HP after receiving the effects of the berry. At the same time, Greedent stashes an Oran berry in its tail. Being hit by a single attack or combination of attacks will cause an Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail (4.5s cd). Berries stay on the ground for 10s. If any ally or enemy eats an Oran Berry, they heal for 45 + 2% max HP (unless the enemy is Greedent). Greedent enemies that eat an Oran Berry heal for 45 + 5 x (Level -1) + 2% max HP
En.GREEDENT_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits and causing one Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_TACKLE_TEXT_1: Leap to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 1s. If this move is used while Covet is active, no area can be designated for Greedent to leap to. Instead, while running, damage is dealt in an area to enemies in front of Greedent. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Tackle's cooldown by 1s for each berry consumed.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_BULLET_SEED_TEXT_1: Spit berry seeds in the designated direction for 6s; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s. Greedent fires more seeds for each Oran berry stashed.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_BELCH_TEXT_1: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed by 15% for 1s. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Belch's cooldown by 1s for each berry consumed (capping at 4s). This move's cooldown cannot be reduced beyond 1s.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_DEFENSE_CURL_TEXT_1: Grants Greedent a shield (10% max HP) for 3s. In addition, an Oran berry will drop in front of Greedent.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_STUFF_CHEEKS_TEXT_1: Greedent drops 5 Oran berries, which can be eaten to recover HP. Any HP recovered from an Oran berry eaten within 5s that exceeds Greedent's max HP will be converted to a shield for 1.8% max HP per berry. If Greedent catches sight of a berry while using this move, movement speed is increased by 70% for 6s, but decreasing by 15% every 1s.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_STUFF_CHEEKS_TEXT_2: Increase the number of Oran berries dropped by 1.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_COVET_TEXT_1: Greedent runs with all its might for 6s; becoming resistant to hindrances (for 6.1s), dealing damage to enemies hit and throwing them. While running; Greedent drops Oran berries every 1s. Eating a dropped berry increases movement speed by 22% for 1s (stacking up to 5 times). In addition, Tackle, Belch or Bullet Seed can also be used while running and using this move will reset the cooldown of Tackle or Belch.
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_COVET_TEXT_2: Increased damage and increased frequency of Oran berries dropping (8 berries over 6s).
En.GREEDENT_MOVE_BERRY_BELLY_FLOP_TEXT_1: Greedent eats a special berry to recover 15% max HP and then leaps to the designated area; becoming briefly unstoppable, dealing damage, and throwing enemies within the area of effect. Greedent then eats another berry, allowing an unlimited amount of Oran berries to be stored for 8s and resets cooldowns of all moves.

Cn.GREEDENT_PA1_TEXT_1: 贪婪者吃下浆果后，受到浆果的影响后恢复HP。与此同时，Greedent 的尾巴里藏着一颗奥兰浆果。被单次攻击或组合攻击击中会导致 Oran 浆果从 Greedent 的尾巴（4.5s cd）掉落。浆果在地上停留 10 秒。如果任何盟友或敌人吃了奥兰莓，他们会恢复 45 + 2% 最大生命值（除非敌人是贪婪者）。吃橙子浆果的贪婪敌人治疗 45 + 5 x（等级 -1）+ 2% 最大生命值
Cn.GREEDENT_BA1_TEXT_1: 每三次攻击都会成为一次增强攻击，击中时造成更高的伤害，并使贪婪者的尾巴掉落一颗奥兰浆果。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_TACKLE_TEXT_1: 跳跃至指定区域，对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并使其移动速度降低20%，持续1秒。如果在 Covet 处于活动状态时使用此移动，则无法指定任何区域供 Greedent 跳跃。相反，在奔跑时，会对 Greedent 前方的敌人造成一定范围内的伤害。如果 Greedent 藏有任何奥兰浆果，则将其全部吃掉，每消耗一个浆果，Tackle 的冷却时间就会减少 1 秒。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_BULLET_SEED_TEXT_1: 向指定方向吐出浆果种子6s；对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并使其移动速度降低30%，持续1秒。Greedent 为每个隐藏的奥兰浆果发射更多种子。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_BELCH_TEXT_1: 对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并使其移动速度降低15%，持续1秒。如果 Greedent 藏有任何 Oran 浆果，则将其全部吃掉，每消耗一个浆果，Belch 的冷却时间就会减少 1 秒（上限为 4 秒）。此招式的冷却时间不能减少超过 1 秒。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_DEFENSE_CURL_TEXT_1: 为贪婪者提供护盾（10% 最大生命值），持续 3 秒。此外，奥兰浆果会掉落在贪婪者面前。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_STUFF_CHEEKS_TEXT_1: Greedent 掉落 5 个 Oran 浆果，可以吃掉它们来恢复 HP。在 5 秒内从奥兰浆果中恢复的任何超过 Greedent 最大 HP 的 HP 将转换为每个浆果 1.8% 最大 HP 的护盾。如果贪婪者在使用此招式时看到浆果，移动速度将增加 70%，持续 6 秒，但每 1 秒减少 15%。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_STUFF_CHEEKS_TEXT_2: 将奥兰浆果的掉落数量增加 1 个。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_COVET_TEXT_1: 贪婪者全力奔跑6s；对障碍物产生抵抗力（持续 6.1 秒），对击中的敌人造成伤害并将其投掷。在跑步的时候; 贪婪者每 1 秒掉落奥兰浆果。吃掉掉落的浆果会使移动速度提高 22%，持续 1 秒（最多叠加 5 次）。此外，还可以在跑步时使用铲球、打嗝或子弹种子，使用此招式将重置铲球或打嗝的冷却时间。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_COVET_TEXT_2: 增加伤害并增加 Oran 浆果掉落的频率（6 秒内掉落 8 个浆果）。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_BERRY_BELLY_FLOP_TEXT_1: 贪婪吃下特殊浆果恢复15%最大生命值，然后跳跃到指定区域；暂时无法阻挡，造成伤害，并将敌人扔到效果范围内。Greedent 然后吃掉另一个浆果，允许无限量的 Oran 浆果储存 8 秒并重置所有动作的冷却时间。
Cn.GREEDENT_MOVE_BERRY_BELLY_FLOP_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，40% 最大生命值护盾
